page.title: 09 GARETH GOES FISHING
page.content: When I go fishing I nearly always catch at least 1 fish.Some fish like very fast flowing places for instance trout,grayling and salmon.These three fish eat small fry and flies.Pike are predators and like roach and perch the best.Pike like to live in slow flowing pools.Chub,roach,dace and bleak live in fast or slow flowing places.When fishing for pike most people use either a lure or a spinner.The main ways of fishing are float fishing, swim feeding and fishing off the bottom.The canal in our area has mainly tench, roach, perch, dace, pike and there are some eels.
